metadata.title: CVE-2021-28650 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: autoar-extractor.c in GNOME gnome-autoar before 0.3.1, as used by GNOME Shell, Nautilus, and other software, allows Directory Traversal during extraction because it lacks a check of whether a file's parent is a symlink in certain complex situations. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-36241.

criterions.comment: gnome-autoar package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.1-1').
